content:
Enable broadcast site banners to let users add a banner with critical information to your Aura and LWR sites. Available in Lightning Experience with your standard Service Cloud license.

Before you enable broadcast site banners, enable Digital Experiences.

From Setup, in the Quick Find box, enter Customer Service Incident Management, and then click Customer Service Incident Management.
From the Broadcast Settings tab, enable Broadcast Site Banner.

After broadcast site banners are enabled, create one or more broadcast topics and assign them to network sites.
title: Enabling Broadcast Site Banners in Service Cloud
